column2: Amazon to support Apple on fight over unlocking iPhone SAN FRANCISCO
column3: Feb 25 Amazon.com Inc  said on Thursday it will support Apple Inc's fight against a magistrate's order
column4: which requires it to help the U.S. Federal Bureau of Investigation break into a San Bernardino shooter's iPhone.
